description:
Modern, double driveway gates open to reveal a delightful surprise… a beautifully renovated 3x1 villa in a superb, walk-to-anywhere Scarborough location.

The FEATURES and BENEFITS:
- Located close to several parklands, popular cafes, schools, shops and public transport. It's also within 2km of the beach.
- The generous amount of useable, private outdoor space is fantastic. There's plenty of room to entertain, relax and play in the fresh air. Have a BBQ and invite a crowd of friends!
- LED lights throughout, with some beautiful pendant lights in the bedrooms.
- Gas bayonet and split-system A/C in the living area, with another split-system in one of the bedrooms.
- You'll love the stylish kitchen, which would look the part in a big family home. It features an abundance of cabinets, with plenty of useful soft-close drawers as well as overhead cupboards. There's also an induction cooktop, glass splashbacks, timber benchtops and an inconspicuous dishwasher.
- Two sets of double French doors allow the light to stream inside, and bring the warmth of timber into the open-plan dining and living areas. There's a seamless flow to the outdoors.
- The spacious master bedroom has an open walk-in robe, and there's a built-in robe in one of the other two bedrooms.
- The stylish family bathroom features as-new fixtures and fittings and great storage. There's nothing to be done in here – or actually anywhere!
- Cleverly designed laundry in which the sink is hidden in a purpose-built cupboard. There's room for the washing machine in here too. Next to the cupboard is a versatile timber bench – use it as a study nook or a place to organise your life. There's also good storage.

Extra HIGHLIGHTS:
- Single undercover carport plus room for another couple of cars inside the gates
- Handy attic storage with convenient ladder access from inside
- Lock up storage room and additional storage shed
- Attractive, easy-care garden beds and vines to add privacy
- High quality security screen to the front door

PROXIMITY
Scarborough Beach Esplanade – 1.6km
Butlers Reserve – 550m
Stewart Park – 190m
General Public Food Co & other Doric St shops – 600m
Brighton Rd Food Market and cafes – 700m
Scarborough Primary School (local intake) – 1.0km
Doubleview IGA and shops – 1.1km
The Downs IGA and shops – 1.3km
Perth CBD – 13.2km

COUNCIL RATES - $1,703.00 p/a approx.
WATER RATES - $1,305.00 p/a approx.
STRATA LEVY - $513.23. p/q approx.
Current Lease in place at $560.00 per week expiry 8th September 2022
